document.full_text: french special forces have detained ivory coast's laurent gbagbo and handed him to leaders of the rebel opposition, after french tanks forced their way into his residence, a gbagbo adviser in france said.
document.title: gbagbo detained by french in his residence, aide says
lines_and_colors: french special forces have detained ivory coast's laurent gbagbo and handed him to leaders of the rebel opposition, after french tanks forced their way into his residence, a gbagbo adviser in france said.
